nodes.text: Titan Three was a callsign held by a TIE fighter pilot of the Galactic Empire's Titan Squadron. One pilot who held the callsign was active shortly after the Battle of Endor, but was shot down and killed during a New Republic strike on the Imperial dockyard at Var-Shaa. When Captain Terisa Kerrill transferred an additional pilot into the squadron, the pilot took the callsign Titan Three.

Titan Three is the callsign held by the Imperial player character in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons. As the player names are customizable, the callsign is used in place of the player's name in other characters' dialogue.
